summary: In our 9th comprehensive report on the COVID-19 pandemic, we provide updates on topics like pandemic emergency rental assistance and tax relief for businesses. We made 5 recommendations , including ways the Treasury Department can more quickly recover rental assistance overpayments. We are also adding the Department of Health and Human Services' (HHS) leadership of public health emergencies to our High Risk List . For...
title: COVID-19: Significant Improvements Are Needed for Overseeing Relief Funds and Leading Responses to Public Health Emergencies
